story_hook.opening_visual: A futuristic robot hand shaking hands with a human, symbolizing the intersection of AI and human employment.
story_hook.hook_concept: The impact of AI on job markets and the human workforce.

visual_segments.narrative_purpose: Introduce the layoffs at Indeed and Glassdoor due to AI.
visual_segments.narrative_context: Show the logos of Indeed and Glassdoor with a downward trend graph to illustrate layoffs.
visual_segments.script_guidance: As AI reshapes industries, companies like Indeed and Glassdoor are making tough decisions.

visual_segments.narrative_purpose: Highlight the role of AI in changing the workforce.
visual_segments.narrative_context: An animation of AI algorithms replacing traditional job roles.
visual_segments.script_guidance: AI is not just a tool but a transformative force in the job market.

visual_segments.narrative_purpose: Show the human aspect of the layoffs.
visual_segments.narrative_context: Employees packing their desks, symbolizing the personal impact of layoffs.
visual_segments.script_guidance: Behind every statistic are real people facing uncertain futures.

visual_segments.narrative_purpose: Introduce Recruit Holdings and its decision.
visual_segments.narrative_context: A portrait of Hisayuki Idekoba with the Recruit Holdings logo.
visual_segments.script_guidance: Recruit Holdings, the parent company, faces the challenge of adapting to AI.

visual_segments.narrative_purpose: Discuss the merger of Glassdoor into Indeed.
visual_segments.narrative_context: A visual merger of the Indeed and Glassdoor logos.
visual_segments.script_guidance: The merger aims to streamline the hiring process in the age of AI.

visual_segments.narrative_context: A photo of Christian Sutherland-Wong with a departure announcement graphic.
visual_segments.script_guidance: Leadership changes reflect the company's new direction.

visual_segments.narrative_purpose: Show the global impact of the layoffs.
visual_segments.narrative_context: A world map with highlighted areas affected by layoffs.
visual_segments.script_guidance: The layoffs span across functions and countries, showing a global trend.

visual_segments.narrative_purpose: End with a look towards the future.
visual_segments.narrative_context: A futuristic cityscape with AI and humans working side by side.
visual_segments.script_guidance: As we navigate these changes, the future of work remains a shared journey.

primary_concepts.visual_metaphor: Robot hand taking a job application from a human hand.

script_structure.call_to_action: How will AI shape your career? Stay informed and adapt.
